entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 24 except 19 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 24 except 19 near Lake Erie. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
